text: Ramón Artigas (1 March 1908 - 4 January 1995) was a Spanish swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Spanish male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Spain Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Swimmers from Barcelona Category:Spanish male freestyle swimmers
title: Ramón Artigas
